categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars drafts

nodes.text: Amber was the name of a thumper caught by Biggs Darklighter on Yavin 4. He named it after his bodyguard on Aquilae. Amber was killed in the Lars treehouse after a group of stormtroopers discovered the structure and investigated. When Biggs and Threepio hid, Amber attempted to defend them and one of the troopers killed him with his lazersword. Biggs was captured, and taken to a waiting Imperial air tank.
